剫字的基本解释

剫
duó
砍伐；加工木材。
治（玉）：“剒犀剫玉。”

剫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duó］
［《廣韻》徒落切，入鐸，定。］
(1)斫木；加工木料。
(2)雕刻。

剫字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剫； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页142第16
【唐韻】徒落切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】達各切，?音鐸。【說文】判也。从刀，度聲。【爾雅·釋器】木謂之剫。【註】治樸之名。【疏】治其樸，俱未成器也。【玉篇】治木也，分也。又通作度。【左傳·隱十一年】山有木，工則度之。又【集韻】動五切，音杜。閉也。本作?。

剫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
剫字的起名意思

暂无。

Pluck
duó
Felling; processing wood.
Treatment (Jade): "Put the rhinoceros and cut jade."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duó］
["Guangyun" only falls into the cut, enters the priest, and settles. ]
(1) Chopped wood; processing wood.
(2) Carving.

[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　剫; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 142-16
[Tang Yun] Tu Luoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Da Geqie,? Yin Duo. [Said the text] sentence also. From the knife, the sound. [Erya·Release Device] Wood is called 剫. [Note] The name of Zhipu. [Sparse] To treat its simplicity, it is not a tool. [Jade articles] Zhimu is also divided. It is also a degree. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleventh Years] Mountain has wood, and workmanship saves it. Also 【Jiyun】moves five cuts, sound du. Close also. This work?.
